channel.title: Kirsten Stalker on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Kirsten Stalker on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Lessons from a scoping study on disabled children and child protection
item.description: KS - Professor Kirsten Stalker KS I am very pleased to have a chance to tell you about the scoping study that we did around disabled children and child protection. This was the research that I carried out with Dr Pam Green-Lister at Strathclyde University, it was funded by the Sir Harry Stewart Trust and we are really keen that practitioners find out about the research and the findings. The research was an 8 month scoping study.

item.title: Child protection and disabled children: lessons from a scoping study
item.description: KS - Kirsten Stalker Recorded in February 2012 KS I am very pleased to have a chance to tell you about the scoping study that we did around disabled children and child protection. This was the research that I carried out with Dr Pam Greenlister at Strathclyde University, it was funded by the Sir Harry Stewart Trust and we are really keen that practitioners find out about the research and the findings.
